summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Prosper Street from Arapahoe Place to 38th Avenue West; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving with portland cement concrete and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16648 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mdoe of "Payment by Bonds".
